Category.name: Technical
Category.description: Report bugs, request new technical features, enhancements or support.

Category.name: Content
Category.description: Request new digital content such as website news, intranet articles, social media posts, or changes to existing intranet or website pages.

Category.name: Graphic Design
Category.description: Request banners, graphics, images or other graphic design elements.

SubCategory.name: Bug - Critical
SubCategory.description: A bug that crashes or renders the application unoperational.

SubCategory.name: Bug - Major
SubCategory.description: A bug that produces one or more errors.

SubCategory.name: Bug - Normal
SubCategory.description: A feature that does not work as expected.

SubCategory.name: Bug - Minor
SubCategory.description: Small visual glitches, typos or other cosmetic bugs.

SubCategory.name: Enhancement
SubCategory.description: A change or add-on to an existing functionality.

SubCategory.name: New Feature
SubCategory.description: A new functionality which isn't currently present in the application.

CategoryInfo.name: Language Warning
CategoryInfo.content: **All requests must be written in English.** Content in other languages can be included in the description or attachment, but all information detailing the request must be in English.

CategoryInfo.name: Content Warning
CategoryInfo.content:
**IMPORTANT:** Please note that your request will only be addressed after a complete form has been submitted. The date at which all the information is available will be considered the request date. All requests will be processed within 48 hours. If urgent, please call us to discuss your request priority.

ALL CONTENT FOR THE GLOBAL WEBSITE AND GROUP INTRANET IS PUBLISHED IN ENGLISH AND FRENCH SIMULTANEOUSLY, WITH NO EXCEPTIONS.

PropertyDefinition.name: URL
PropertyDefinition.description: Link to the page where the problem is or an example of a page.
